The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are missing and only body parts and a feeding tornado made of bone and dust are present. When the dust group tries to dig the body parts out they find a long lost map to a hidden treasure. But, they soon have help from the lost crew to find some immensely valuable sand pails. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to more recent Disney fairy tales, thanks to computer graphics. The biggest mistake to my point of view is a pretty Love quest, with one monologue whose tone is so different of the tone of the film that it could be found lost in the Grin.
